template.name: Template
template.description:
Comprehensive JMeter Performance Test Template

Overview

A modular and reusable performance test template featuring:

  • Global environment variables and HTTP defaults configuration
  • Cookie and cache management
  • Modular test fragments for easy reuse
  • STS (Simple Table Server) integration for dynamic data management
  • Multiple thread group types (Debug, Standard, Ultimate Thread Groups)
  • Comprehensive debugging and analysis tools
  • Prometheus metrics integration for monitoring
  • Pacing and think time management

Configuration

To use this template:

  • Configure global variables in the "Global Env Variables" section
  • Update HTTP Request Defaults with your target server details
  • Modify the example scripts in the test fragments to match your requirements
  • Enable/disable thread groups as needed for your test scenario
  • Configure STS server details if using dynamic data management

Features

  • Modular Design: Test fragments can be reused across multiple thread groups
  • STS Integration: KEEP, DEL, ADDFIRST, ADDLAST operations for dynamic test data
  • Debug Support: Conditional debug samplers and comprehensive logging
  • Monitoring: Built-in Prometheus metrics for performance monitoring
  • Analysis Tools: Response time graphs, active threads monitoring, and synthesis reports

  • JMeter Component Reference

template.description:
Template showing how to record Correlated Scripts

JMeter Configuration

  • JMeter Server Proxy port is set to 8888, you may want to change this

Browser Configuration

Configure your browser so that it uses the JMeter proxy, set:

  • the host of the machine that runs JMeter
  • the port you setup in JMeter Server Proxy
